title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 May 08 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 08 May 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Thursday, May 8 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers news coming out of Washington, D.C. The U.S. House of Representatives voted to hold former IRS official Lois Lerner in contempt of Congress for refusing to testify about the agency's harassment of Tea Party groups. Maryland's Democratic Rep. Elijah Cummings claimed that holding Lerner in contempt amounts to "McCarthyism," despite the fact that 10% of donors to Tea Party groups were audited, a figure much higher than the audit rate for average Americans. 

Alex also covers new developments in political suppression and geopolitics. 

Constitutional lawyer and author Bruce Fein joins the show to discuss the FEC chairman's warning that government officials want to regulate the alternative media. 

Also joining the broadcast is former United States Foreign Service employee & author Peter Van Buren to break down the current standoff between world powers that is expanding beyond Ukraine.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper:
